name: Racing Car Stunts Advan
description:
Racing Car Stunts Advan is a stunt car driving simulator packed with extreme car stunt and fast car drifting stunt for all flying car stunt games lovers. Be careful to handle jumping car while doing monster car stunts on mid-air ramps in this car race challenge. Drive these fantastic car, take part in this stunt car racing challenge and prove yourself a real stunt hero. This is a stunt simulation and we are offering you crazy car stunts in the air.
FEATURES:

Realistic brakes and simulations.
Sharp and narrow impossible and difficult racing tracks to ride.
Awesome quality HD graphics.
Marvelous 3D game graphics and realistic views.
Smooth controls and easy game play.
Different camera views to make simulation driving easy.
